Tried swapping the entire distance sensor, and moving from rio I2C to navX MXP i2c. Any help is Big shoutout to that \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eFTA\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"FIRST Technical Advisor\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e. Haven’t had the issue since those couple matches, but we plan to swap to a different distance sensor as soon as possible and stay away from the I2C.
